name: TorahFacts
0:
”Alexa, ask Torah Facts to tell me a Torah Fact”
”Alex, ask Torah Facts to give me a fact”
”Alex, ask Torah Facts to tell me something interesting”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: torah facts
des: Discover new facts about the Torah, the central book of Judaism with Torah Facts! Ask Torah Facts for a fact and you will get back something you might not have known before. How long does it take to write a Torah? Who came after Moses in leadership? Who reads from the Torah? How often is it read? All these and more can be found out with Torah Facts.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
